涹字的基本解释

涹
wō
〔渨涹〕见“
沤（恥 ），长时间地浸泡。渨”。

涹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wō］
［《廣韻》烏禾切，平戈，影。］
(1)混浊。
(2)浸泡。
(3)山名。

涹字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　涹； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页628第20
【廣韻】【集韻】?烏禾切，音倭。濁也。【博雅】溾涹。汙濊也。　又漚也。【周禮·冬官考工記·㡛氏】漚其絲。【註】楚人曰漚，齊人曰涹。　又山名。【山海經】蔥聾山東十五里曰涹山。　又【集韻】弩罪切，音餒。與浽同。亦濁也。　又於僞切，音萎。水所聚也。一曰漚也。

涹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
涹字的起名意思

暂无。

Chuan
wō

Retting (shame), soaking for a long time.渨".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wō］
["Guangyun" Wuhe cut, Ping Ge, shadow. ]
(1) Turbidity.
(2) Soaking.
(3) The name of the mountain.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　涹; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 628 20
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wuhe cut, sound widow. Muddy. 【Bo Ya】Fin Chuan. Dirty also.　It's also rushing. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·㡛's】make its silk. [Note] The people of Chu said that the people of Chu said rushing, and the people of Qi said that they were rushing.　Also the name of the mountain. 【Shan Hai Jing】Cong deaf fifteen miles in Shandong is called Chuan Mountain.　 [Jiyun] Crossbow crime cut, sound discouraged. Same as Xun. Also muddy.　In the pseudo-cut again, the sound faded. The water gathers too. One said, retting.
